properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_RESERVATION WHERE RSVT_DATE = ? AND RSVT_TIME = ?
INSERT INTO TB_RESERVATION ( RSVT_NO ,RSVT_DATE ,RSVT_TIME ,MEM_INFO ,RSVT_HOS ,RSVT_MEM ,RSVT_DOC ) VALUES ( SEQ_RSVT_NO.NEXTVAL ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? )

SELECT RSVT_NO ,RSVT_MEM ,RSVT_DOC ,RSVT_HOS ,RSVT_DATE ,RSVT_TIME FROM (SELECT RSVT_NO ,RSVT_MEM ,RSVT_DOC ,RSVT_HOS ,RSVT_DATE ,RSVT_TIME FROM TB_RESERVATION WHERE RSVT_MEM = ? ORDER BY RSVT_NO DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
